room.description: This is a place to sleep. A hatch in the corner leads down.
room.item: A book with some spells in it
A cloak the purple of the night sky, complete with moons and stars

room.name: The Plaza
room.description: This is a large open area with lots of people. Your wizardly tower to the north casts a long shadow over the plaza.

room.name: Your living room
room.description: The living room of your wizardly tower. A ladder leads upwards. To the south is a wooden door leading to the plaza. A hallway leads west to your alchemy lab.

room.name: Your alchemy lab
room.description: Here's where you cook up all sorts of crazy potions. A metal staircase goes downwards.
room.item: No one knows what this drink might be capable of

room.name: Dungeon
room.description: A dank, dark place full of green fuzz and a spooky atmosphere. A not-so-secret passage to the south leads to the plaza, and a metal staircase spirals upwards into the darkness.
room.item: A clump of green stuff of questionable origin
